title: Riot Support ticket issues.
body:
Let me preface this by saying I do understand that Riot Support have to go through a ridiculous amount of tickets... however the responses I've been given with my issue just seems like they don't care at all.

On the 1st November my account got taken from me which I thought was strange as I have pretty decent password (or so I thought) I only noticed my account had been compromised on the 2nd of November as I hadn't played for a few days, I logged on to my name changed, RP spent and my friends list deleted, I still had access to my account as they did not change the password for whatever reason.

I scanned my PC with a few different anti-viruses/anti-malware software and literally nothing came up so it definitely wasn't any sort of virus.
A day later I spoke to one of the people on my friends list that the 'hacker' added, he told me that the 'hacker' actually bought my account off a website which bruteforces accounts for $0.80, for those of you who don't know what bruteforcing is, follow this website: http://searchsecurity.techtarget.com/definition/brute-force-cracking

Anyway, so I submitted a ticket to Riot about it, took about 4 days for a response which they then told me I have to be logged out to submit a ticket about a hacked account. Fair enough.

So I create a ticket whilst logged out, after a bit of back and forward they can verify that I am the actual account owner.
But wait - here's the kicker... They either didn't read what I wrote or they simply didn't understand it, I explained the whole brute-forcing thing and in the reply they wrote this: http://imgur.com/a/QKbYg

They completely ignored my request about getting my name changed back and RP to be refunded, as far as they were concerned I needed help accessing my account which I didn't.

And on top of all this, they've responded a few times the last 2 days but for whatever reason the ticket is glitched and I cannot see any replies anymore and any reply they send is not being sent to my e-mail inbox, I can still reply and I've said about 3 times now that I cannot see whatever they are writing and for them to e-mail me, but every day I just see the ticket as of when it was last updated. http://imgur.com/a/3WNP2 http://imgur.com/a/X63DC

I'm really not sure what to do, but the person who has been helping me with my query (tomahelps) has not helped me in any way whatsoever.
If this can get some sort of visibility, hopefully someone from Riot can help move this along faster.

Sorry for the extra long post but I'm beyond pissed now and I'm really not sure where else to post about it as they don't seem to be able to help me.

Thanks

replies.body: It looks like the specialist has reached out to you again today on your ticket. Are you able to properly view your ticket now?
